comment:
Hi E&SW Been following the Justice for Johnny Community for a while now but this is my 1st message to you.  Something doesn't add up here, I believe Amber may have asked WB to fire Johnny.  But Johnny has a vastly superior working relationship / history with Warner Brothers than Amber does & they could easily in-validate her claims.  You can't tell me WB is not aware of the evidence out there which incriminates Amber.  In all high profile cases of abuse  other victims start to come forward e.g. Weinstein / Cosby / Spacey.  The actual opposite is what's happened with Johnny,  I'm telling you something is off.

There's a reason Amber was so confident with the U.K. trial, & verdict that I've yet to figure out.  She had connections to the Judge.  But it appears that Amber's talents don't really lie in acting they're more in networking I'd say, & inserting herself into positions that can gain her favour, after all she did exactly that with Johnny, love bombing etc.  Her history & acquaintances need to be thoroughly investigated in the same way she tried to find dirt on Johnny by using a Private Investigator.  As it is, we know she's the one with the speckled history when it comes to DV & abuse.  

This all points to a very devious, volatile, & Confrontational human being, with narcissistic traits.  Anyway keep up the good work in the Community.
author: Alan Lubin
